item.title: Help needed with Dragon Crossbow
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

salahalzubi:

as ak226688 and maybe u havent typed add model “item id” when u got in game hope ive helped

just to clear things up, its the model id, not the item id
(the item id is the id you use to spawn the item)

item.title: Help needed with Dragon Crossbow
item.dc:creator: @ak226688 ak226688
item.description:
@ak226688 wrote:

if(i == 9765) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 0; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 0; class8.anInt174 = 13422; class8.anInt181 = 1100; class8.anInt190 = 498; class8.anInt198 = 550; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -1; class8.anInt194 = -1; class8.anInt165 = 13421; class8.anInt200 = 13421; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.aBoolean176 = false; class8.aString170 = "Dragon C'Bow"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A powerful and rare crossbow".getBytes(); } try this and type
“add model 13421”
“add model 13422”

if that dosent work use ur normal ints and type that

item.title: Help needed with Dragon Crossbow
item.dc:creator: @Ill_Pk_You Ill Pk You
item.description:
@Ill_Pk_You wrote:

Assassins Creed Fan:

Please change the thread’s name into something like ‘Help Needed With My Dragon Crossbow’ also this is client sided, you should post it into the section ‘Private Server Client Hacking’

Ok, I’ll do it right now ;).

wayzey:

I’m pretty sure you either overwrote something, set drop model as wield on accident(as in you switched drop and wield models around) or you never positioned it properly.

Uhm, I’ll try that then. Thanks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 23, 2009, 01:34:48 pm[/size][hr]Has anyone got a Dragon C’bow model and the Class8 code?? This is really ticking me off :(. Or can someone help me??

Read full topic

item.title: Help needed with Dragon Crossbow
item.dc:creator: @Ill_Pk_You Ill Pk You
item.description:
@Ill_Pk_You wrote:

Well, I tried fixing my Dragon Crossbow in my client and it just didn’t work and decided to give me 100 errors, I tried it again and same thing. Does anyone know how to fix this? Screenshots:


My Class8.java Model code:

if(i == 9765) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 0; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 0; class8.anInt174 = 13421; class8.anInt181 = 1100; class8.anInt190 = 498; class8.anInt198 = 550; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -1; class8.anInt194 = -1; class8.anInt165 = 13422; class8.anInt200 = 13422; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.aBoolean176 = false; class8.aString170 = "Dragon C'Bow"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A powerful and rare crossbow".getBytes(); }

Can anyone suggest what I could do??

Thanks in advance :).

Read full topic
